# Code

## Generating data

```{r}
library(dplyr)

p <- 10
n <- 100

beta_0 <- 0
coefs <- 1:p

predictors <- matrix(rnorm(n*p), nrow = n, ncol = p)

errors <- rnorm(100)
observations <- beta_0 + predictors %*% coefs + errors

generated_data <- as.data.frame(
  cbind(observations, predictors)
) #V1 is Y and the rest are the predictors
```
